channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Bluetooth Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Bluetooth Driver

item.title: CVE-2017-8628|2024-08-05T16:41:24.195Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20bluetooth%20driver
item.description: Microsoft Bluetooth Driver in Windows Server 2008 SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, 1703 allows a spoofing vulnerability due to Microsoft's implementation of the Bluetooth stack, aka "Microsoft Bluetooth Driver Spoofing Vulnerability".
